data.title: Apartments in Wayland, MI
data.meta_description: Check for available units at Village Green Apartments in Wayland, MI. View floor plans, photos, and community amenities. Make Village Green Apartments your new home.
data.text:
Welcome to Village Green Apartments

Village Green Apartments of Wayland is a welcoming community nestled in the woods providing a country setting while still near the heart of Wayland. Village Green Apartments features spacious 1-, 2-, and 3-bedroom homes with clean finishes, abundant storage, heat included in rent, and in building laundry. Wayland is a small city located about twenty miles due south of Grand Rapids, only five minutes from US-131. Home to around 4,000 people, the community exhibits a distinctive small-town vibe, particularly in the charming downtown district around the intersection of Main and Superior. Here you'll find local favorites for dining, everyday services, and convenience shopping. Wayland offers a great location with opportune access to the bustling city of Grand Rapids. While the leasing office is not on site, GLM Companies is eager to meet the inquiries and needs of all its current and future residents. The GLM Companies office is located at 800 Monroe Ave NW, Suite 120, Grand Rapids, MI 49503. Mailing address: PO Box 2607, Grand Rapids, MI 49501
